tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    policy_description TEXT,
    access_control VARCHAR(20) CHECK (access_control IN ('ALLOW', 'DENY'))
)

CREATE TABLE policies (
    policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(100),
    policy_description TEXT,
    policy_type ENUM('access', 'security'),
    policy_action VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE access_controls (
    control_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    control_name VARCHAR(100),
    control_description TEXT,
    control_type ENUM('role-based', 'attribute-based'),
    control_action VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE network_infrastructure (
    infrastructure_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    infrastructure_name VARCHAR(100),
    infrastructure_type ENUM('core_network', 'radio_access_network'),
    infrastructure_location VARCHAR(100),
    infrastructure_security_level VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(100),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    vendor VARCHAR(50),
    firmware_version VARCHAR(20),
    serial_number VARCHAR(30)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    password VARCHAR(100),
    role VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE access_control (
    access_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    device_id UUID REFERENCES network_devices(id),
    access_level VARCHAR(20),
    granted_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_vulnerabilities (
    vulnerability_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID REFERENCES network_devices(id),
    vulnerability_type VARCHAR(50),
    severity VARCHAR(20),
    description TEXT
);
